title: ‘Stop outsourcing genomics testing’ Irish senators tell government ‘upscale now’ [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Every year, 20,000 genetic tests are sent to laboratories in the UK, US, Germany, Spain and Finland - senators want to bring that testing back to Ireland
summary_public: Every year, 20,000 genetic tests are sent to laboratories in the UK, US, Germany, Spain and Finland - senators want to bring that testing back to Ireland
